name: Crunch Time (vitorbrito, MarianaLopez, JaiRaj47, NickAnderson)
description:
Crunch Time is a 3D isometric view co-op puzzle game, in which 1-4 players work together to implement new features to fulfill the contracts they receive.  Crunch Time will be available on PC, and designed for console controllers.

Players work together on the art, programming, sound, and level design aspects of each feature they’re implementing.  Players have to balance finishing their tasks and avoiding losing progress.  Players will have to fight back against the changing environment, computer bugs, exhaustion, and remembering to save to fully implement each feature.

                

The Team:

Jai Raj  - Level Designer

Mariana Lopez  -  Artist

J. Vitor de Brito  - Programmer

Nick Anderson  - Project Manager
